channel.title: Microscope Images Processing & Understanding on Yuanhao Guo
channel.description: Recent content in Microscope Images Processing & Understanding on Yuanhao Guo

item.title: I. Microscope images processing and understanding by computer vision
item.description: In this projects we develop automated pipeline based on deep learning and computer vision models for characterizing static and dynamic behaviors of multi-scale phenotypes from bright-field and fluorescent microscope images.
